original_text: Whereas I have not dwelt in any house since the time that I brought up the children of Israel out of Egypt, even to this day, but have walked in a tent and in a tabernacle.
korean_text: 내가 이스라엘 자손을 애굽에서 인도하여 내던 날부터 오늘까지 집에 살지 아니하고 장막과 성막 안에서 다녔나니

sentences.original_text: Whereas I have not dwelt in any house
since the time that I brought up the children of Israel out of Egypt
but have walked in a tent
